title: PyOhio 2011: Multi-player Games using Panda3D and Python
description:
Multi-player Games using Panda3D and Python

Presented by Peter Carswell

This two-hour tutorial is designed to investigate the implementation of
a multi-player game using the game engine Panda3D. Panda3D's intended
game- development language is Python. The concepts involve Object
Oriented Programming structures, modeling and texture mapping,
key-binding motion, collisions and, finally, networking techniques.
